abstract: Jiangsu Rongsheng Heavy Industries has enlisted Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase to advise on its long-gestating initial public offering, Reuters reported.
snippet: Jiangsu Rongsheng Heavy Industries has enlisted Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase to advise on its long-gestating initial public offering, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: In a bid to make final preparations for its long-gestating initial public offering, Jiangsu Rongsheng Heavy Industries has enlisted Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase, Reuters reported, citing unidentified sources.
